title: Internal Probe Decries GM's 'Incompetence And Neglect'
teaser: An internal probe of how General Motors handled an ignition switch defect has found "a pattern of incompetence and neglect" at GM. On Thursday, CEO Mary Barra announced the dismissal of 15 employees, many of whom were executives and senior managers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
